title: Introducing: King Nun – Tulip
body:
Absolutely love this debut track from **King Nun**, a quartet of teenagers from London, recently signed to Dirty Hit.

In its frenetic two and a half minutes, it manages to give nods to the likes of At the Drive-In, Test Icicles and even the more refined but equally cutting sound of early Bloc Party – in short, it’s f\*\*king awesome. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
